DOC.brief_title: Distribution Neutrophils Bronchial Mucosal Tissue Asthma Patients Before After 4 Weeks Treatment With AZD 5069
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose investigate bronchial tissue neutrophil count distribution asthma patient 4 week oral treatment AZD 5069
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male female patient Caucasian origin , age 18 65 year , inclusive , time informed consent obtain . 2 . Physician base ( accord GINA 2011 ) diagnosis asthma least 6 month prior date informed consent obtain confirm 1 detailed respiratory criterion state CSP 3 . Morning prebronchodilator ( ie , abstinence shortacting longacting ßagonist treatment ≥ 6 ≥ 12 hour , respectively ) FEV1 ≥70 % predict normal ( PN ) age , sex height enrolment 4 . Increased number neutrophil induce sputum sample baseline , relative neutrophil count ≥ 50 % total sputum cell count 5 . Physician prescribed daily use medium high dose ICS ( ≥ fluticasone 250 μg ≤ 1.000 µg equivalent daily , define GINA 2011 ; see CSP Appendix E ) plus LABA . 1 . History clinically relevant allergy idiosyncrasy AZD5069 investigational CXCR2 antagonist , inactive ingredient ( ) IMP , toolsubstances ( eg , salbutamol , local anaesthetic ) use purpose study 2 . History severe asthma exacerbation require hospitalization within last 12 month screen . 3 . Asthma exacerbation require treatment course systemic ( ie , oral parenteral ) corticosteroid within 3 month screen ≥ 3 course within last 12 month screen . 4 . Moderate severe airflow limitation ( FEV1 < 70 % PN ) 5 . Any chronic low respiratory disease asthma ( see CSP detail ) , judge Investigator Medical Monitor , would interfere evaluation IMP interpretation patient safety study result .
